name: Little Triassic Get Down!
description:
controls: arrows or wasd and space, also supports game pads. when the game says "L+R" it means the l and r keys ot on a controller. 

you are a cave man hungry for T-Rex eggs so you embark on a journey to find some. you also find some sticky golden rocks on the way (they are pretty) but maybe they have a use too? (secret better ending) and maybe you learn something about friendship or something idk.

To all of the dinosaur fans: I'm sorry its not scientifically/historically accurate

Wishlist my steam game: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1923380/RobotX/
